name: Hate Free Heroes Online
description:
Based upon the RPG, Hate Free Heroes Online expands upon the adventure through this community based online game. Play from any web browser, tablet or phone. Build your agency, upgrade your offices with equipment, hire agents to increase your resources, make medical advancements, research, complete missions, go out on the field and defeat aggromites, engage in cyber defense pvp, upgrade your character gear and so much more. Launch the game from the client or from any web browser. Collect your steam achievements using the game client and record your active play time on steam.



*If you don't yet have the single player RPG, get the bundle!

  • Fully browser based. No downloads needed. Play from any system, phone, tablet or PC
  • Upgrade your agency base with equipment to earn resources
  • Engage in Cyber Defense PVP and build your PVP Rank
  • Explore the city and defeat aggromites to level up your character (Level Max +120)
  • Buy gear and upgrade your character equipment
  • Complete research and medical advancements
  • Earn in game achievements to earn meta crystals
  • Complete Quests and Missions
  • Join or create your own agency branch and earn experience
  • Compete for ranking and climb the ranks
  • Countless hours of gameplay
  • Free soundtrack MP3 "Time to Be a Hero"
  • and so much more...

*One time fee for full access. All resources can be earned fairly in game. No additional payment necessary. "ELITE Sponsorship" is the only additional digital package you can purchase outside of the game itself. "ELITE Sponsorship" is a one time digital purchase and lasts for as long as you have your game account. Because it is a one time purchase, it can NOT be stacked by purchasing it again.

"ELITE Sponsorship" grants a bonus of "Meta Crystals" to start off with and a great increase in "Meta Crystals" earned at the beginning of every month. It also grants some cosmetic perks like achievement avatars, elite sponsorship chat background etc. Sponsorship is not needed to progress in the game but it helps to fund our efforts, helps fund our free updates and expansions, and it helps keep the game a "one time payment" model. We believe in the one time "pay and play for ever" business model and we hope to have your support so we can keep our games that way for always.
